title: Defiance ETFs CIO: Great Day to Buy the Dip
itunes:title: Defiance ETFs CIO: Great Day to Buy the Dip
description:
Sylvia Jablonski, CIO at Defiance ETFs, discusses the global stock rout, fiscal spending, the housing market, and sectors to watch. Jose Herrera, Co-Founder & CEO of Horatio, discusses the changes to the customer experience tech industry, and supply chain disruptions. RJ Gallo, Senior Fixed Income Portfolio Manager & Head of the Municipal Bond Group at Federated Hermes, discusses the Federal Reserve taper timeline, and the municipal bond space. Alan Crawford, Bloomberg Government Senior Editor, discusses his Big Take Story, Soaring Housing Inequality Is Now a Global Political Faultline. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Alan Crawford, Bloomberg Government Senior Editor, discusses his Big Take Story, Soaring Housing Inequality Is Now a Global Political Faultline. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.
